reviewtext: I love my Palm Vx. I thought of buying the M500 but decided not to due to the cost and not currently being supported by Omnisky Wireless. I like the M500's screen better than the Palm Vx but not enough to justify the extra $100. As of now I didn't see any need for the expansion slots but I'm sure over time there will be a number of usefull extras that come on the expansion cards.Overall I'm pleased with the Palm Vx and would recommend it to anyone.
